name: Sunbyte
description:
Sunbyte is a game about an Evil Prince who steals Princess Bell's private supply of snacks, called Sunbytes, she'll have to beat 10 levels of frustrating platforming and very conveniently placed spikes.

Extra features n stuff: 3.121% chance of not jumping, this is intentional, to make the game more frustrating - Willy & Billy, two new characters who will annoy the player by throwing pineaple pizza and placing bombs around them! (Feature still in development, not present on current builds) - Rice Bowls, that serve as checkpoints - And Water Bottles, they're basically like coins.

On later builds, you'll be able to turn these on or off, they're all enabled on the most recent build.

There's a debug command (C KEY) that lets you automatically beat any level. Only the first 2 are playable. Only Windows is supported for now, the game may run on wine. IDK though.
